name: DJ Barnett
about: Student at the University of Kentucky pursuing degrees in Business Administration and Digital Media Design. Aspiring to work with a Major League Baseball organization.

experience.title: Graphic Designer
experience.description: Creates digital and print designs using Adobe Photoshop. Specializes in photography, editing, and image enhancement.

experience.title: Umpire
experience.description: Officiates games with attention to detail and accuracy. Demonstrates teamwork, leadership, and communication skills in a dynamic environment.

education.degree: Business Administration and Digital Media Design
